data.comment: The match is underway in Rio de Janeiro.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Bragantino.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro, German Cano (Vasco da Gama) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 3, Bragantino have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yago Pikachu of Vasco da Gama is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 5, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 8, Bragantino needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Bragantino throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 11, Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 13, Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 16, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino at São Januario.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 19, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Rodolpho Toski Marques blows against Bragantino's Alerrandro for offside.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 24, Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno is whistled for offside at São Januario.
Throw-in for Bragantino at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama's German Cano is caught offside.
Lucas Evangelista's header is off-target for Bragantino.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 33, Vasco da Gama are pushing forward but Bruno Gomes's finish is wide of the goal.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Bragantino have been awarded a penalty...
In Rio de Janeiro Bragantino drive forward through Alerrandro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 41, Bragantino are awarded a penalty at São Januario. Alerrandro takes the kick ... But misses!
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Uillian Correia of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 45, Talles Magno for the home team is judged to be offside.
Important block from the Vasco da Gama defence as Bruno Tubarao fires in a strike for Bragantino.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 45, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Bragantino.
The first-half is over at São Januario.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Bragantino are coming forward and Lucas Evangelista gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Alerrandro (Bragantino) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 47, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Vinicius scores to make it 1-0 at São Januario.
In the minute 50, Juninho with an assist there.
Goal! Bragantino go level at 1-1 through Lucas Evangelista in Rio de Janeiro.
Alerrandro instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 52, Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Rio de Janeiro.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 53, Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 55, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Leo Ortiz (Bragantino) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Bragantino are in shooting range from this free kick.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 58, Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the away team a throw-in.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 64, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Bragantino at São Januario.
Guilherme Parede is on a sub for Talles Magno for Vasco da Gama.
Cayo Tenorio is replacing Yago Pikachu for the home team.
In the minute 69, Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Vasco da Gama push forward at São Januario and Henrique Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bragantino defence.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 73, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Bragantino's area.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Lucas Evangelista, who is grimacing with pain.
Bragantino's Lucas Evangelista looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 77, Bragantino pushes forward through Alerrandro, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Juninho with Carlinhos. This is the third substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Vinicius with Ygor Catatau.
Bragantino make their first substitution with Luis Phelipe replacing Claudinho.
Bragantino are coming forward and Artur gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Bragantino.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 81, Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Carlinhos (Vasco da Gama) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Rio de Janeiro, Ygor Catatau of Vasco da Gama is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 82, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Morato is on a sub for Artur for Bragantino.
Bragantino make their third substitution with Jan Hurtado replacing Alerrandro.
In the minute 83, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 85, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 89, Vasco da Gama's Carlinhos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
Mauricio Barbieri (Bragantino) is making a fourth substitution, with Barreto replacing Bruno Tubarao.
Mauricio Barbieri is making the team's fifth substitution at São Januario with Weverson replacing Edimar.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at São Januario. The final score is 1-1.
Guilherme Parede (Vasco da Gama) has received a first yellow card.
Ribamar is replacing Marcos Junior for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
At São Januario, Bruno Gomes has been yellow-carded for the home team.
